Detailed Description

an exception object representing any exceptions thrown during the building of a response object in a response handler

A DODSResponseException can be built by either passing the error string to the constructor or by instantiating an empty object and using the derived set_error_description method.

To retreive the error string simpy use the get_error_description method.

See also:
DODSBasicException

DODSResponseHandler

DODSResponseObject
